author: Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D., Thomas D. Williams, Ph.D.
title: Pope’s Preacher: Coronavirus Has Made Us Forget About ‘Building Walls’
description: Never has humanity been so united as now by a coronavirus that “knows no borders,” the preacher of the papal household, Fr. Raniero Cantalamessa, said on Good Friday.
content:
ROME Never has humanity been so united as now by a coronavirus that knows no borders, the preacher of the papal household, Fr. Raniero Cantalamessa, said on Good Friday.
Preaching before Pope Francis in an empty Saint Peters Basilica while live-streaming to … [+1962 chars]
